original_text: David mustered the men who were with him and appointed over them commanders of thousands and commanders of hundreds.
korean_text: 이에 다윗이 그와 함께 한 백성을 찾아가서 천부장과 백부장을 그들 위에 세우고

sentences.original_text: David mustered the men who were with him
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗은 그와 함께 있던 사람들을 소집했다

sentences.original_text: and appointed over them commanders of thousands
